12 namespace oxygine
13 {
14  class ResourcesLoadOptions
15  {
16  public:
17  ResourcesLoadOptions() : _loadCompletely(true), _useLoadCounter(false), _shortenIDS(false) {};
18 
19  //load only Resources definitions. Skips internal heavy data (atlasses/textures/buffers). Could be overridden in xml: <your_res_type ... load = "false"/>
20  ResourcesLoadOptions& dontLoadAll(bool v = false) { _loadCompletely = v; return *this; }
21 
22  //use load counter internally
23  ResourcesLoadOptions& useLoadCounter(bool v = true) { _useLoadCounter = v; return *this; }
24 
25  //use not standard folder with prebuilt resources (atlasses, fonts, etc)
26  ResourcesLoadOptions& prebuiltFolder(const std::string& folder) {_prebuilFolder = folder; return *this; }
27 
28  //use load counter internally
29  ResourcesLoadOptions& shortenIDS(bool v = true) { _shortenIDS = v; return *this; }
30 
31 
32  bool _loadCompletely;
33  bool _useLoadCounter;
34  bool _shortenIDS;
35  std::string _prebuilFolder;
36  };

113  struct registeredResource
114  {
115  registeredResource() {id[0] = 0;}
116  char id[16];
117  createResourceCallback cb;
118 
119  static bool comparePred2(const registeredResource& ob1, const char* ob)
120  {
121  return strcmp(ob1.id, ob) > 0;
122  }
123 
124  static bool comparePred(const registeredResource& ob1, const registeredResource& ob2)
125  {
126  return strcmp(ob1.id, ob2.id) > 0;
127  }
128 
129  bool operator < (const char* ob2) const
130  {
131  return strcmp(this->id, ob2) > 0;
132  }
133  };
